text: Never seen that combination for stairs. Might be worth a mock up. WatchOut: It is likely that cork needs a harder edge for the stairs, which would not be ideal since you start to add stripes to a clean look/material change.
ah good point. in floor tiles it is contained on all sides
I dk if we’re talking about cork for part of the stairs people could sit on, but I have some cork benches from ikea and they’re amazingly comfortable
not sure how to cleanly implement that Jenny, but it is a very interesting thought
